attributes.action: Ban hate parties such as the BNP from general elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hate parties such as the BNP that want to govern this country need to be stopped. They cause hate among communities and could destroy the morals of society. I understand that in a democracy every party has the right to go into a general election, however in the 21st century these hate parties need to be stopped. We need to make a stand and show the world we are a race blind country. We need to stop them campaigning and handing hate leaflets across the country. Racist parties need to be blocked from having a voice. They fuel terrorism amd fuel racial discrimination. End this in the 21st century of today.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot host party political material, such as references to political parties. More information can be found in the terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
